articles.summary: Zacks: Top Analyst Reports for Advanced Micro Devices, Goldman Sachs and Lam Research. AMD, LRCX and GS headline Zacks Research Daily, which spotlights 16 analyst-picked stocks selected from roughly 70 reports. Related tickers mentioned: ALOT, AMD, BDCO, CB, GS, LRCX.

articles.title: RBC Bearings' Aerospace & Defense Growth Picks Up: A Sign of More Upside?
articles.mainIdea: RBC Bearings' Aerospace & Defense Growth Picks Up: A Sign of More Upside?
articles.summary: Zacks: RBC Bearings' Aerospace & Defense Growth Picks Up: A Sign of More Upside?. RBC is seeing accelerating aerospace and defense growth, fueled by strong OEM demand, a rising backlog and robust defense orders. Related tickers mentioned: HWM, RBC.

articles.title: Does Parker Hannifin’s 41% 2025 Surge Still Make Sense Given Growth Expectations?
articles.mainIdea: Does Parker Hannifin’s 41% 2025 Surge Still Make Sense Given Growth Expectations?
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Does Parker Hannifin’s 41% 2025 Surge Still Make Sense Given Growth Expectations?. If you are wondering whether Parker Hannifin still makes sense at its current price after its massive run, or if you may be late to the party, this breakdown will help you consider whether the current price makes long term sense. The stock has barely paused this year, climbing 40.8% year to date and 38.6% over the last 12 months, on top of an increase of 215.9% over three years and 254.0% over five years. Behind those moves, investors have been responding to Parker Hannifin’s growing role in...
